Bash(git -C /home/gnydick/IdeaProjects/k2plus commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix REPL hybrid threading and trace disconnect handling

klipper_repl.py:
- Rewritten with hybrid approach: threading for socket I/O,
  reactor callbacks for thread-safe Klipper interaction
- Uses InteractiveConsole for proper multi-line input
- Added run_gcode\(\) helper and rs\(\) shortcut for serial_485

trace_hooks_streaming.py:
- Fixed disconnect handling to prevent printer crashes
- Added robust exception handling in client read/disconnect
- Filter both bytes and _bytes objects for serial polling

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
